member.name: M:ColorThiefDotNet.ColorThief.GetColor(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use the median cut algorithm to cluster similar colors and return the base color from the largest cluster.
member.param: 1 is the highest quality settings. 10 is the default. There is a trade-off between quality and speed. The bigger the number, the faster a color will be returned but the greater the likelihood that it will not be the visually most dominant color.

member.name: M:ColorThiefDotNet.ColorThief.GetPalette(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use the median cut algorithm to cluster similar colors.
member.param: 1 is the highest quality settings. 10 is the default. There is a trade-off between quality and speed. The bigger the number, the faster a color will be returned but the greater the likelihood that it will not be the visually most dominant color.

member.name: M:ColorThiefDotNet.ColorThief.GetColorMap(System.Byte[][],System.Int32)
member.summary: Use the median cut algorithm to cluster similar colors.

member.returns: Histo (1-d array, giving the number of pixels in each quantized region of color space), or null on error.
